snippet: New York City residents must register by Friday in order to vote in the general election on Nov. 5, which will include the vote for mayor.
abstract: Deadline approaches for New York City residents to register in order to vote in general election on Nov 5, which will include vote for mayor.
lead_paragraph: New York City residents must register by Friday in order to vote in the general election on Nov. 5, which will include the vote for mayor.

headline.main: Deadline Friday for New Yorkers to Register to Vote
headline.print_headline: Deadline Today For New Yorkers To Register to Vote
